mapper.update: UPDATE sys_function_info set TYPE_ID = #{typeId}, FUNCTION_NAME=#{functionName}, FUNCTION_URL=#{functionUrl}, FUNCTION_DESC=#{functionDesc}, FUNCTION_ICON=#{functionIcon}, STATUS=#{status}, last_update_TIME=now(), last_update_user_id = #{lastUpdateUserId}, last_update_user_name = #{lastUpdateUserName}, last_update_depart_id = #{lastUpdateDepartId}, last_update_depart_name = #{lastUpdateDepartName} where FUNCTION_Id=#{functionId}
mapper.select: select function_id, function_name, function_desc, FUNCTION_ICON, parent_function_id, function_url, function_seque, is_virtual, function_type, remark, status, TYPE_ID, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_depart_id, create_depart_name from sys_function_info where parent_function_id =#{parentFunctionId}

SELECT function_id, function_name, function_desc, FUNCTION_ICON, parent_function_id, function_url, function_seque, is_virtual, function_type, remark, status, TYPE_ID, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_depart_id, create_depart_name FROM sys_function_info t where parent_function_id =#{parentFunctionId} order by function_seque asc LIMIT #{startRecod},#{pageSize}

SELECT t.FUNCTION_ID, t.FUNCTION_NAME, t.FUNCTION_DESC, t.FUNCTION_ICON, t.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID, t.FUNCTION_URL, t.is_Virtual, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, TYPE_ID, t.function_type FROM sys_function_info t where FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId}

SELECT t.FUNCTION_ID, t.FUNCTION_NAME, t.FUNCTION_DESC, t.FUNCTION_ICON, t.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID, t.FUNCTION_URL, TYPE_ID, t.is_Virtual, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, t.function_type, DICTIONARY_ID FROM sys_function_info t where PARENT_FUNCTION_ID = #{parentFunctionId}

SELECT t.FUNCTION_ID, t.FUNCTION_NAME, t.FUNCTION_DESC, t.FUNCTION_ICON, t.PARENT_FUNCTION_ID, t.FUNCTION_URL, TYPE_ID, t.is_Virtual, t.FUNCTION_SEQUE, t.STATUS, t.function_type FROM sys_function_info t where STATUS='Y' order by FUNCTION_ID ,FUNCTION_SEQUE asc
mapper.insert:
select if ( max(function_id) is null = 1, concat(#{parentFunctionId},'001'), if ( LENGTH(max(function_id) + 1) = LENGTH(#{parentFunctionId})+2, concat('0',(max(function_id) + 1)) ,concat('00',(max(function_id) + 1)) ) ) from sys_function_info where parent_function_id=#{parentFunctionId}
insert into sys_function_info (TYPE_ID,function_id, function_name, function_desc, function_icon, parent_function_id, function_url, function_seque, is_virtual, function_type, DICTIONARY_ID, DICTIONARY_Name, status, create_user_id, create_user_name, create_depart_id, create_depart_name) values (#{typeId},#{functionId}, #{functionName}, #{functionDesc}, #{functionIcon}, #{parentFunctionId}, #{functionUrl}, 1, 0, #{functionType}, #{dictionaryId}, #{dictionaryName}, #{status}, #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, #{createDepartId}, #{createDepartName})
mapper.select: select count(*) from sys_function_info where parent_function_id =#{parentFunctionId}
